text: Dinofroz is an Italian animated television comedy series. == Plot == Tom Carter and his friends are teleported to the past by a board game, where they use magical stones called Rockfroz to transform into dinosaurs and fight against the evil Dragon Lord Neceron. With the help of a powerful Shaman, a loyal mammoth named Nelsten, and Tomâ€™s time-traveling father, they battle to save the world from the dragons' tyranny. Category:English-language television programs
title: Dinofroz
